actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: A resolution authorizing the appropriation of funds for the acquisition of a monument to Dr. Ralph J. Bunche and its erection in the United Nations Plaza Park in New York City.

summary.text: Authorizes appropriations for the acquisition of a monument to Doctor Ralph J. Bunche and its erection in United Nations Plaza Park in New York City.

titles.title: A resolution authorizing the appropriation of funds for the acquisition of a monument to Dr. Ralph J. Bunche and its erection in the United Nations Plaza Park in New York City.
